TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegionData extends System.Object

summary.span: 封裝組成 物件的資料。

span.span: Encapsulates the data that makes up a object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的`Paint`事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立矩形，並繪製其以黑色畫面。Creates a rectangle and draw its to the screen in black. - 建立使用矩形區域。Creates a region using the rectangle. - 取得 RegionData。Gets the RegionData. - 繪製到螢幕，區域資料 （位元組陣列） 使用 DisplayRegionData helper 函式。Draws the region data (an array of bytes) to the screen, by using the DisplayRegionData helper function. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/VB/form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Data { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定位元組的陣列，這個陣列指定 物件。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of bytes that specify the object.

value.span: 位元組的陣列，這個陣列指定 物件。

span.span: An array of bytes that specify the object.

remarks.format: ## Examples - 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的`Paint`事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 程式碼範例示範如何使用從其中一個物件來設定另。The code example demonstrates how to use the from one object to set the for another . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#13)]
